thread.title: Fidelity Names Day New Agency President

author: cnbc.com
title: Fidelity Names Day New Agency President

organizations.name: national agency operations for fidelity national title group

text:
JACKSONVILLE, Fla.--(BUSINESS WIRE)-- Steven G. Day, NTP, has been promoted to the position of President of National Agency Operations for Fidelity National Title Group. In this position, Day will oversee Fidelity’s network of over 5,000 agents across the country.
This press release features multimedia. View the full release here: http://www.businesswire.com/news/home/20180201006098/en/
Steven G. Day Promoted to National Agency President with Fidelity National Title Group. (Photo: Business Wire)
Since joining Chicago Title in 1986, he has held a variety of positions, including Rhode Island state counsel and Rhode Island state manager for Chicago Title, as well as New Jersey state manager for both Chicago Title and Ticor Title's direct and agency operations and Regional Manager for the Northeast Region of the company. Prior to this promotion, Day served as Executive Vice President and Divisional Manager for Fidelity National Title Group.
As Division Manager, Day was responsible for the direct, agency, and commercial title operations in the Northeast and Mid-Atlantic regions. “Steve is a great steward of our industry and I’m excited to have him assume leadership of our Agency operations,” remarked Randy Quirk, CEO of Fidelity National Financial. “His experience, coupled with his inspired leadership and practical knowledge of the industry, make him a great fit for the role of National Agency President. “
Day earned his Bachelor of Science Degree in Business Management from the University of Bridgeport, and his Juris Doctorate from Suffolk University in Boston. Day is also currently serving as the 2017-2018 President of the American Land Title Association.
About Fidelity National Financial, Inc.
FNF is a leading provider of title insurance and transaction services to the real estate and mortgage industries. FNF is the nation's largest title insurance company through its title insurance underwriters - Fidelity National Title, Chicago Title, Commonwealth Land Title, Alamo Title and National Title of New York - that collectively issue more title insurance policies than any other title company in the United States. More information about FNF can be found at www.fnf.com .
